name: Colorooh
description:
Meet the sweet Coloroohs and help them to find their right spot and color!

TESTIMONIALS

"Overall, Colorooh is a great game all around. With its outstanding and numerous levels, brilliant graphics, and wonderful sound effects, it is definitely hard to find anything wrong with this game. 8.5/10" {Capsulecomputers}

"It's essentially 4 games in one, I can probably go ahead and delete about 6 games on my device now that I have all the games in one with brilliant level design and gorgeous artwork with amazingly high polish."

"Completely unique gameplay"

"Puzzle mode is my favorite..have never played gameplay like it. Completely innovative and utilizes the touch screen perfectly!"

The game contains 4 challenging game modes, each one with 200 levels!

MODES

- Puzzle-Mode: Color all the Coloroohs with the right color, according to a few rules and within a given number of turns!

- Innovative Match3-like-Mode: Find at least two neighbours with the same color for all the Coloroohs on the screen!

- Shift-Mode: Position all Coloroohs on the right spot by shifting columns and rows!

- Memory-Mode: Memorize the colored Coloroohs and try to color the Coloroohs with the correct color!

FEATURES

- 800 levels free to play!
- 8 different themes
- smooth and intuitive controls using the touch screen interface
- amazing retina graphics
- great sound and animations
- GameCenter achievements
- Coloroohs!

INFO
